name: Faded Stories: Full Moon
description:
Once approximately every 100 years, the unburied and forgotten undead gather in the city of Greenberg to undertake their final march. The missing, accident victims, and the murdered—everyone who hasn't been properly laid to rest participates in this event. The ultimate destination is the city catacombs, whose gates are opened by the city authorities during an event called the Full Moon.



Faded Stories: Full Moon is an adventure game set in the surreal and unpredictable city of Greenberg. The entire series consists of short stories whose main aim is to showcase the culture, customs, and laws that govern this extraordinary place. Take on the role of an ordinary citizen and experience unusual events that could only happen in a city like this.



[Game Features]
  • Unique and creative puzzles
  • Varied art and gameplay styles for different chapters
  • Constantly fresh and surprising gameplay mechanics
  • Secrets
  • Surreal and atmospheric world
